name: Banana's Wild Adventure Ft. Sprite
description:
UPDATE: v1.0 had a crash before the end of the game! It has been fixed in v1.1 so please download the new version!

Banana and Sprite are out on a walk! What happens? Find out in this thrilling (it's actually pretty chill), and  crazy (again, pretty chill) adventure!

Made for an Asset Flip jam! All assets come from the original selection, minus the background music which is the song Becoming Friends from Danganronpa V3.

While we had a pretty tight schedule for this jam, I've wanted to learn RenPy, so I decided this might be a good time to give it a shot. While it's not a terribly difficult engine to work with by any stretch of the imagination, it did take a bit to adjust to something that wasn't unity lol. 

No web version because RenPy's default web export doesn't work on itch, and the web export for itch specifically is windows only, which I don't have currently. So enjoy the desktop versions.

Known Bugs:

v1.0 - Crashes before reaching the end of game (Fixed in 1.1!)
